*k7 k2tog repeat from * 3 more times 32 sts k 4 rounds begin gusset shaping round 1 k5 k1f&b place marker k to end of round 33 sts rnds 2 through 10 k to 1 st before marker k1f&b k to end of round 42 sts at end of round 10 divide for thumb round 11 k16 place the next 10sts on holder k to end of round 32 working sts on needles hand work st st for 26 more rnds shape top of hand round 1 ssk k12 k2tog twice 28 sts round 2 ssk k10 k2tog twice 24 sts round 3 ssk k8 k2tog twice 20 sts round 4 ssk k6 k2tog twice 16 sts round 5 ssk k4 k2tog twice 12 sts round 6 ssk k2 k2tog twice 8 sts round 7 ssk k2tog twice 4 sts break yarn thread through rem sts and cinch closed thumb divide 10 sts on holder onto larger dpns set-up round knit 10 sts pick up and k 4 sts across thumb gap 14 sts next round k10 k2tog k2tog 12 sts knit 9 rounds or desired length to fit thumb shape top of thumb round 1 k2tog around 6 sts round 2 k2tog around 3 sts break yarn thread through rem sts and cinch closed right mitten work
